title: Aquanil Cleanser 16 fl oz.
description: For Sensitive SkinNon-ComedogenicHypoallergenicFragrance FreeRecommended by DermatologistsAquanil™ provides gentle, complete cleansing of sensitive skin.  Aquanil is specially formulated to be free of oils and irritating soaps. Aquanil, with its emollient effect, provides a skin-softening action as it cleanses. Aquanil contains no fats of any type.

title: Garnier Silky Secret Leave-In Daily Care Conditioner, 8.5 Fluid Ounce
description: Conditions and detangles for silky-softness, root to tip.

title: Garnier Fructis Style Brilliantine Shine Glossing Spray, 3 Fluid Ounce
description: Turn on the shine to brilliantly styled hair! Garnier fructis style brilliantine shine, with fruit micro-waxes, seals shine and moisture into the hair for long-lasting, in-control style with lustrous sheen.
